quote: Fools talk, cowards are silent, wise men listen.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quote: The only way out is through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: The law of harvest is to reap more than you sow. Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit and you reap a character. Sow a character and you reap a destiny.
author: James Allen

quote: Don't criticize what you can't understand.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Everyone wants to go to Heaven, but no one wants to die.
author: Robert Kiyosaki
